Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

Place.name: aggregateRating
Place.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Place.name: containedIn
Place.description: The basic containment relation between places.

Place.name: events
Place.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

Place.name: geo
Place.description: The geo coordinates of the place.

Place.name: interactionCount
Place.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

Place.name: maps
Place.description: A URL to a map of the place.

CivicStructure.name: openingHours
CivicStructure.description: The opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day. Multiple days can be listed with commas ',' separating each day. Day or time ranges are specified using a hyphen '-'.- Days are specified using the following two-letter combinations: Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa, Su.- Times are specified using 24:00 time. For example, 3pm is specified as 15:00. - Here is an example: Tuesdays and Thursdays 4-8pm. - If a business is open 7 days a week, then it can be specified as Monday through Sunday, all day.
